content: type of instructions - written instructions - english only and us crochet terminology used - visual help included paid version - no charts - multiples included paid version skill level - you must know how to read a crochet pattern - you must know basic crochet stitches - chain single_crochet skip double_crochet etc - you must know how to skip stitches - you must know how to follow instructions - best for advanced beginners to intermediate crocheters finished size - 15 x 75 15 inches approx yarn & hook - any aran yarn yarn brand included in the pattern - 5 5mm crochet hook terms of use - for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy - all digital sales are final
